text: Brian Marsden (born 29 September 1947) is a weightlifter from New Zealand. He competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in the Light-heavyweight class, and the 1976 Summer Olympics in the Middle-heavyweight class, coming 12th at each games. He competed in the Men's 90 kg class at the 1974 British Commonwealth Games where he won a bronze, and the 1978 Commonwealth Games where he won a silver. == References == ==External links== *Profile at NZOGC website Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand male weightlifters Category:Weightlifters at the 1974 British Commonwealth Games Category:Weightlifters at the 1978 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for New Zealand Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for New Zealand Category:Weightlifters at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Weightlifters at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic weightlifters of New Zealand Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for New Zealand Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in weightlifting
title: Brian Marsden (weightlifter)
